hero.title: TOGETHER, WE GO FURTHER
hero.description: The SOGAT Group relies on specialized subsidiaries that combine their expertise to meet demanding industrial challenges. SP2I Ferroviaire secures train rooftop access, Aretec designs special machines, and SERMAS develops aluminum equipment alongside SP2I PrÃ©hension, a heavy-load handling expert. Tracip Environnement manages industrial fume treatment, while Tracip MÃ©cano provides metal fabrication and machining of complex structures. Together, they deliver efficient, innovative solutions tailored to today's challenges.

references.title: OUR VALUES
references.solutions: Our engineering teams innovate daily and foster co-development with our clients.
references.project: Project management is essential at SOGAT and ensures effective collaboration with our clients.
references.results: For each project, we aim to achieve quality, cost, and timeline objectives.
references.services: Four companies working in synergy and a network of technical partners worldwide ensure reliable support throughout the lifecycle of our equipment.

metiers.title: Our Professions
metiers.description: We specialize in various professional domains, offering expertise across multiple sectors. Our team consists of highly qualified professionals who bring years of experience and deep industry knowledge to every project.

sermas.title: SERMAS
sermas.description: SERMAS specializes in industrial automation and robotics solutions, providing cutting-edge technology for manufacturing processes.

tracip-environnement.title: TRACIP Environnement

haquette.title: HAQUETTE
haquette.description: HAQUETTE brings recognized expertise in custom industrial solutions, meeting the specific needs of each client.

iserco.title: ISERCO
iserco.description: Iserco has been an expert in bulk handling since 1981. The company designs and manufactures its equipment in-house. Its engineering office and two workshops (carbon steel and stainless steel) enable custom, turnkey solutions tailored to every need.

groupe.title: PRESENTATION OF SOGAT GROUP
groupe.description: For over 30 years, we have been designing custom industrial solutions that help drive forward the largest players in the industry. A family-owned company with strong technological DNA, SOGAT combines innovation, expertise, and hands-on mastery to support its clients from design to production, all the way to on-site service. We operate across various sectors: railway, automotive, nuclear, steel, food industry, luxury, pharmaceutical, and environmental. Using cutting-edge technologies such as retractable catenaries, coil handling systems, punching, and aluminum cutting.

foundation.label: Year of creation of the first company (SOGAT = 1987)

departments.label: Specialized design offices in robotics, electrical, automation and mechanics

overview.title: SOGAT a family-owned, independent, historic and high-growth group
overview.subtitle: An economic model based on:
points: Family group (3rd Generation)
Portfolio of recurring key account customers, some of whom have been working with the group for over 30 years
International clients and prospects
Significant diversification of our clientele (Railway, automotive, nuclear, steel and aluminum, Food processing, Luxury, Pharmaceutical, Environment, etc.)
Recognized expertise and strong innovation capacity where we are leaders in France
Quality management team in place
Agile, flexible, experienced workforce with an average age of around 40 years

expertise.title: Our Expertise
expertise.description: With over 30 years of expertise, the SOGAT Group masters the entire industrial cycle: engineering, automation, manufacturing, installation and support. From design to commissioning, we deliver comprehensive, tailored solutions to meet today's industrial challenges.

mechanicalDesign.title: Advanced Mechanical Design Office
mechanicalDesign.description: Our product studies are conducted with the utmost care, ensuring maximum integration of industrial manufacturing concepts and maintenance simplicity.
points: Preliminary design, dimensioning and conception
3D modeling: CATIA and SOLIDWORKS
Static and dynamic simulation
Finite element analysis
Aeraulic calculations (smoke and chip extraction)

electricalAutomation.title: Electrical Engineering & Industrial Automation
electricalAutomation.description: Our design office creates reliable, modern electrical and automation solutions, integrating Industry 4.0 technologies.
points: Electrical dimensioning: power, diagrams, complete architectures
Automation & regulation: Siemens, Allen Bradley, Schneider, Pilz, ABBâ€¦
Industrial robotics: Fanuc, KUKA, ABB, Yaskawaâ€¦

integratedManufacturing.title: Integrated Manufacturing
integratedManufacturing.description: Our manufacturing teams produce complete mechanical and electrical assemblies with high standards, from welded structures to final assembly.
points: Boilermaking: welded assemblies compliant with drawings and specifications
CNC machining: boring mill, horizontal/vertical lathe, milling machine, machining center
Quality: 3D measurement arm controls, COFREND certified personnel
Assembly: sub-assemblies and complex systems
Connections: electrical, pneumatic, hydraulic
Electrical cabinet manufacturing: wiring, testing and integration

mechanicalConstruction.title: Mechanical Construction
mechanicalConstruction.description: TRACIP masters the entire production chain for welded products, whether unique pieces or series. From profiles, sheets or tubes, our workshops produce assemblies compliant with drawings and specifications, with the possibility of handling the design as well.
equipment: CNC vertical lathe â€“ Ã˜ 2.5m table

onsiteWork.title: On-site Operations
onsiteWork.description: Our team intervenes directly on-site to install, optimize and maintain your automation systems. We combine field expertise and advanced technologies to ensure reliability, performance and production continuity.
points: Installation and commissioning of automated equipment
Integration of control and supervision systems
Modernization of electrical cabinets and industrial networks
Diagnostics, troubleshooting and preventive maintenance
Performance optimization and production downtime reduction

service.title: SOGAT Service
service.description: Our "SOGAT Service" department ensures complete customer support, from startup to the entire equipment lifecycle, through a global network of specialists guaranteeing reliable and responsive assistance.
